description: Young Mason Wyler is learning about Maritime history. He's reading up on old ships, legendary captains, and epic gales. And as his imagination runs wild, he can't help but wonder what it would be like to be captured at sea by blood thirsty pirates! But not just blood thirsty...cock hungry, too.As Mason imagines being chained in a ship's hull, he grows a fat boner thinking of how he and the captain would have to rub their bodies together to keep warm. Mason tugs his meat and pretends the big, bad, bearded captain is making him suck his dick because it might be the captain's last chance to get off. Insert your own 'seamen' joke here.Enjoy!
title: Mason Wyler
